title: Polar Change - average rate of change

content.question: <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math><math alttext="0"><semantics><mn>0</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math><math alttext="pi over 12"><semantics><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>12</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math><math alttext="pi over 6"><semantics><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math><math alttext="r equals f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math><math alttext="0"><semantics><mn>0</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>​<math alttext="5 over 2"><semantics><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math><math alttext="fraction numerator 5 square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>​​The table gives values of a polar function <math alttext="r equals f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for selected values of <math alttext="theta"><semantics><mi>θ</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. If the value of <math alttext="r equals f open parentheses pi over 12 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>12</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is estimated using the average rate of change of the function over the interval <math alttext="0 less or equal than theta less or equal than pi over 6"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, which of the following is true?

choices.label: ​​​The estimated value would be an overestimate of the actual value by approximately <math alttext="0.223"><semantics><mn>0.223</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​The estimated value would be an underestimate of the actual value by approximately <math alttext="0.223"><semantics><mn>0.223</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​The estimated value would be an overestimate of the actual value by approximately <math alttext="0.335"><semantics><mn>0.335</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​The estimated value would be an underestimate of the actual value by approximately <math alttext="0.335"><semantics><mn>0.335</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

content.answer: ​The estimated value would be an underestimate of the actual value by approximately <math alttext="0.335"><semantics><mn>0.335</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

topic.text: 3.15: Rates of Change in Polar Functions

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
